body.name: ExtraCharm Insulated Lunch Bag for Women/Men - Reusable Lunch Box for Office Picnic Hiking Beach - Leakproof Cooler Tote Bag Organizer with Adjustable Shoulder Strap for Adults

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 27 mins
features: EXCELLENT THERMAL INSULATED: ExtraCharm lunch bag adopts three-layer heat insulation design: the outer layer is durable 300D Oxford cloth and polyester fiber, the inner layer is Eco-friendly EVA material, and the middle layer is specially filled with 5mm thick insulating pearl foam. Our reusable lunch box can keep the food cold/hot/fresh for hours, which is perfect for on-the-go meals, picnics, road trips, beaches, as well as to have lunch in the office, outdoors!

LEAKPROOF & EASY TO CLEAN: The lunch bag is made of ultra-thick EVA soft lining and hot-welded seams without any needle holes to prevent leakage. The lunch bag is easy to clean. If the sauce spills inside, please wipe it off with a damp cloth or napkin. With heavy-duty Oxford cloth and superb tailoring technology, the adult lunch bag is dustproof, waterproof, durable and keep your food clean.

LARGE CAPACITY & MULTI COMPARTMENTS: The insulated lunch bag is 10 x 6.7 x 8 inches,and the main zipper compartment is designed to provide you with lunch and hot/cold/fresh drinks. The front zipper pocket can store keys, cards, napkins and phone chargers. Two mesh pockets for water bottles and an inner mesh bag for knives, forks and spoons are perfect for packing all food and snacks all day long.

CONVENIENT & PORTABLE: This reusable lunch bag has a firm handle and a removable and adjustable shoulder strap. It can be easily carried with one hand, or it can be firmly tied to a backpack or briefcase. The modern and lightweight design is very suitable for women, men and adults. It can be used as a lunch bag, insulation bag, picnic bag, food container, sundries bag or shopping bag.

IDEAL GIFT CHOICE: High-quality reinforced metal SBS double zipper can ensure smooth opening, wide mouth design for deposit and withdrawal. Our ExtraCharm tote bag is a wonderful gift for Thanksgiving, Christmas for family and friends. It’s also an ideal gift for Mother’s Day and Father’s Day. If you are not satisfied with the reusable lunch box, please feel free to contact us for a solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: - Are you still wasting money and time to eat out? - Stop having expensive fast food for you or your family! - With the unique design provides extremely efficient meal and lunch box organization, ExtraCharm Insulated Lunch Bag provides a healthier lifestyle for you, your family and your friends.

LONGER INSULATION Made of ultra-thick soft EVA lining, filled with 5mm thick insulation pearl foam, our insulated lunch bag keep your food cold / warm / fresh for longer than plastic bag. SAFE & DURABLE MATERIALS The lunch bags are safe for you and your family, protected by the 300D polyester & oxford outer fabric, the reusable lunch box is strong and durable.
PRODUCT DETAILS STRONG HANDLE FRONT POCKET INNER MESH POCKET SIDE POCKETS
DUSTPROOF Resistant to dirty and abrasion LEAKPROOF Extra thick soft EVA liner and seamless Easy to Clean Just wipe it off with wet cloth or napkins

MAXIMUM STORAGE EFFICIENCY A main zipper compartment, a front zipper pocket, two mesh pockets and an internal mesh pocket, there is enough space to pack all your food and items throughout the day, such as lunch, keys, cards, napkins, phone chargers, water bottle, knife, fork and spoon. LUNCH BAGS FOR WOMEN/MEN The reusable tote bags feature with modern design great for women, men and adult to bring lunch, drinks, snack, water bottle, napkins, condiments, utensils, sauces to work, office, picnics, hiking, beach, office, gym and more! CONVENIENT & PORTABLE One reinforced handle on top and comes with a removable and adjustable shoulder strap which can be adjusted from 14" to 26", offer you with more carrying options. Wide opening design makes it convenient to fill and take foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Functional, and Perfect for Daily Use!
reviews.reviewText: The ExtraCharm Insulated Lunch Bag has truly exceeded our expectations! My husband has been using it at work and he couldn't be happier with its performance.The sleek black design is not only stylish but also suitable for both men and women. The quality of the insulation is impressive, keeping food at the perfect temperature for hours. It's spacious enough to fit a hearty lunch, snacks, and even a drink, making it ideal for a full day at the office.The leakproof feature is a game-changer. No more worrying about spills or messes inside his bag! The adjustable shoulder strap adds another level of convenience, allowing for easy carrying, especially when his hands are full.The durability of this lunch bag is evident in its sturdy construction. It's clear that it's built to withstand daily use and last for the long haul.Overall, the ExtraCharm Insulated Lunch Bag is a fantastic investment for anyone in need of a reliable and stylish lunch tote. Its functionality, quality, and design make it a top-notch choice. We couldn't be more pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewText: Great lunch box, easy to carry, lots of room. Solid value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bag for lunches
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice quality. It is sturdy and holds so much. Keeps things cold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this lunch box! Keeps my food cold, very spacious and there were more storage then I thought there’d be also easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Lunch Bag is Easy to Clean and Durable!
reviews.reviewText: The Insulated Lunch Bag is a versatile gem, perfect for school, office, picnics, hikes, or beach outings. Its 12-can capacity, leakproof design, and adjustable shoulder strap make it a game-changer. I appreciate its durability, easy cleaning, and trendy style. This cooler tote keeps my meals fresh and is a must-have for anyone on the go. Say goodbye to bland lunches and hello to convenience and flair! Highly recommended for those who crave a blend of functionality and fashion in their daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this, obsessed !
reviews.reviewText: AMAZING! holds 4 baby bottles and mason jar of extra milk, so much space. need to purchase ice pack separately but keeps cold well with one in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small in the wrong places
reviews.reviewText: I knew this wasn't a huge lunch bag, but it's also terribly small in the wrong places. For example, good luck sticking a thermos in the side mesh pockets. The pockets won't come up even halfway, so your thermos will fall out the minute you throw the shoulder strap on. Thermos or not, if you put ANY drink in the side mesh pocket, there's not enough mesh, so a bottle or can will push into the internal space, limiting the overall carrying space for items placed inside. Ridiculous.Love the appearance, but NOT a practical lunch bag in most instances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and stylish
reviews.reviewText: Great lunchbox with lots of room for several containers, cans, etc. Looks good too. Zipper works just fine so far.

It is a nice bag over all,however I have been using this bag for the past 9 monthsand the bag is developing a little hole.It's only a small hole so maybe I can use it for a while longer.Also unless this bag is kept impeccably clean it will attract bugs.I just give it a clean out with soap and water every now and again.It does have two side pouches and I use one for storing my cell phoneThat being said I'm not sure that I'd buy this lunch bag again. I like the things I buy to lastdecades. I am a little upset to see a hole when I have owned this product for less than a year.
